name: Jacklyn Stegman
text:
After our bad accident (a semi truck merged into us at 65mph) myself and my mother-in-law were referred to Heninger Garrison Davis as the people who could help us the best. Let me tell you, they were right. The people we worked closest with were Mark,  Eric, and Beverly, and they are all so friendly and helpful.

Even considering that I moved to a different timezone shortly after the accident, I still felt that I was able to easily communicate with them about any questions or concerns I was having (they respond with most efficiency to email in my experience).

During negotiations with the other party (which lets face it, thats the part all of us care about the most) I was shocked by how willing this practice was to work with us and help us obtain the settlement we needed to finally put this ugly event behind us. While I sincerly hope that I am never in another situation that would call for it, I would happily use this law firm again and/or refer them to any friend or family member in need of legal representation.

text: Jim has been my attorney since 2015 and has been a huge asset to not only my family but to our business as well. I cannot say enough about him and his abilities. name: Tara Davenport
text:
In December 2015 Jim Pino was referred to me by a family friend, also an attorney and who’s advice and opinion matter greatly to me.

I needed an attorney who would fight for me. To help and advise me with a divorce after 23 years of marriage. I knew going into it that it wasn’t going to be anywhere close to pretty, much less easy for a multitude of reasons. But I also knew that I had “hit my wall” and it was necessary. I also knew that I was going to have to have an attorney that would work with me, not just for me. I had been married since I was 21.... nothing about anything was easy and I was terrified about everything.

And that’s exactly what Jim did for me.

Jim and his amazing staff helped me through one of the hardest times of my life and helped me find myself again.

I would and do, recommend Jim Pino & Associates to any and everyone who asks.

Thank you Jim and thank you to your awesome staff!!

name: Gordon Madden
text: There is not enough space to share my experience with Jim and the entire staff. They have worked with me for over a decade (11) years. Almost daily, many nights, weekends even when they've been on vacation. Never once failing to jump up to the emergency, or simply to make sure my son was protected. Because of Jim and his family, staff and associates, I have been given the opportunity to have a wonderful relationship with my little boy. He's stood in my defense against 17 different lawyers, sometimes 5 against 1. His son has stood with me as well. We've had multiple trials, most recently he postponed major surgery and suffered through a 4 day trial. Agonizing in Pain against 4 very reputable lawyers. Not to mention, he did this for 1/5 of the money the other guys were being paid. He did it because he cares and felt that it was in my son's best interest and we'll being. Just today, our order was issued. Once again, his hard work and character and one of a kind skill prevailed. I still have sole custody and I am assured a meaningful relationship with the most important thing in my life. I can never repay Jim for his decade long dedication to making sure we're protected. If you need help, a brief visit with him will reveal the true character and heart he puts into making sure justice prevails. My name is Gordon Madden and I would be happy to share my story with you.

text: Mr. Pino went above and beyond to help me. He explained everything very thoroughly and let me know what to expect. He was honest and gave me options. I have used Mr. Pino on a few occasions with success every time. I highly recommend using Mr.Pino.

name: Andrew Carroll
text: He helped me get 50/50 visitation with my child and be able to more of an influence in his life. I tried a few other attorneys before I found Austin Burdick. He is very professional and will fight for you just like he did for me. He is a firm believer in equal parental rights. I tried for eight years before finally switching to him. His virtue is uncompromising when it comes to fighting for what is right for and father and his child. No other attorney that I have found works harder for the best interest of the child than Austin. Thank you for always doing your best when it came to my case. You treated it like it was your own child you were fighting for.

name: Mark Davis
text:
Austin, an exceptionally qualified attorney, has represented my best legal interests since 2013. Austin has always gone well above and beyond his required legal duty to protect my rights. I have personal knowledge of Austin doing the same for others.

Austin - accurately - will defend unwarranted legal filings made by opposing corrupt attorneys, he will file accurate legal filings without unnecessarily creating additional strife in your personal life all the while protecting your legal rights, he will personally drive across the state of Alabama for jailed clients working to obtain their freedom, he will call out injustice and attempt to correct it, and he knows - and gets - Constitutional law (a rarity in Alabama).

If Alabama had more attorneys like Austin working to protect citizen’s legal interests in doing what is right rather than lining pockets and making legal friendships our state would be a better place to live.

If you want to retain an effective attorney that will work timely and efficiently to protect your rights, Austin is the attorney to retain.

/s/ Mark Davis
Florence, Alabama
mark.davis.al@icloud.com

text: good guy at first-  but Does not return emails timely, refuses to keep cyou in the loop. Excessive billing. bills too long for simple emails or letters Not effective. Horrible communicator. Does not listen. I would never hire him again.

resp.text: I am disappointed in your assessment. You seem to have forgotten that you asked me to review complex corporate/LLC documents and provide you with legal analysis of the same. The letters written for you required considerable analysis. The analysis and letters that you received were of excellent quality. As to the communication, you sent me an email that I was not able to respond to while in court. I did contact you once I was out of court. We discussed this and you seemed to understand. As a litigation attorney I cannot stop trials or hearings for the sake of emails. You received timely responses and never went even 24 hours without a response. Your prior emails to me praised the quality of my work. So your review comes as a shock to me. I wish you the very best of luck in the future.

name: Jaclyn Skuce
text: She was very reassuring during a so-called free consultation, that I hired her immediately. Everything she said during the consultation ended up to be false. All she did for me was file a notice of appearance and never had time to meet or go over my case file. When we were only a couple days away from the next court date she claimed "My niece has been in a terrible accident and hanging on to life by threads.  I will be back in touch with you before end of week." That was the kinda responses I got for every email I sent. She never got back to me or had time for my case. After several phone calls to her office, where you cannot get a live person to answer. I finally got a phone call back which I did record. I asked for an itemized statement which she claimed she doesn't give those. I asked it I could speak with the legal assistant working on my case she claimed she doesn't have those. I asked how much I had left in my retainer so I would have proof, since I didn't trust her at all at this point. She wouldn't give me a number but claimed I had plenty left that she doesn't charge much for anything. After I fired her she sent an itemized statement claiming I only had a couple hundred left and it would be mailed to me. I have filed a BBB complaint and a dispute with credit card company. I have not received anything from her and this was months ago. Do not hire this lawyer. This has got to be fraud. $3500 for a notice of appearance.

name: Kaitlyn Head
text: I couldn’t be more pleased with Warren Freeman and his amazing assistant, Valerie. I had multiple felony drug charges that had been hanging over my head for nearly 4 years. Since those charges were brought against me, I had turned my life around and became the person that I was intended to be. Warren saw that. He listened to my story, he cared and he made sure he did everything in his power to get the outcome I truly deserved. In Warren’s words I was “a true success story” and he wasn’t going to let that go without being heard. He went over and beyond by meeting with the District Attorney multiple times to discuss my case. Even after negotiating a plea deal that I never dreamed possible, he still went back AGAIN and laid my story out – showing how I had turned my life around – and getting me an even better deal than before. Warren cared. He believed in me and my story. I will be forever grateful for the time and commitment he gave to my case.

resp.text: Kaitlyn, it was a pleasure working with you. We wish you nothing but the best!
